transcript:
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Haan ji.
Customer: Piyush sir good morning.
Executive: Good morning boliye.
Customer: Ji Amrit baat kar raha hu sir aapka account manager India Mart se.
Executive: Ji bataiye.
Customer: Ji sir aapka sansan use hua tha kal aapne kal aapko do teen baar call kiya tha sir.
Executive: Office pahunch ke office pahunch ke baat karta hu na.
Executive: Office pahunch ke baat karta hu na.
Executive: Theek hai theek hai.
Customer: Theek hai theek hai.
summary:
\n
Concerns:\n
- Customer called regarding the use of sansan and previous call attempts.\n
\n
Resolution:\n
- None\n
\n
Next Steps: \n
- Issue not resolved. Executive will talk after reaching the office.\n
\n
Alert (If Any):\n
None\n
@@@Sentiment:\n
Neutral\n
\n
@@@Key Topics:\n
account manager, sansan use, call
\n
\n
